com.trg.dao.hibernate
Class HibernateDAOHQLImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
          com.trg.dao.hibernate.HibernateDAOHQLImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
Direct Known Subclasses:
GeneralDAOImpl, GenericDAOImpl
public class HibernateDAOHQLImpl
extends org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport

Base class for DAOs that uses HibernateDaoSupport and HQL for searches. It also fills in sessionFactory automatically using Spring Autowire.

Author:
dwolverton

_update

protected void _update(java.lang.Object object)
Update the corresponding object in the database with the properties of the specified object. The corresponding object is determined by id. NOTE: The Java object becomes attached to the Hibernate session.

_merge

protected void _merge(java.lang.Object object)
Update the corresponding object in the database with the properties of the specified object. The corresponding object is determined by id. NOTE: The Java object does not become attached to the Hibernate session. It remains in its current state.
